name: Animal Wars - Beta
description:
Objective:

  • Defend your base from the waves of enemies with your little bunny minions! If a single enemy reaches your base it's game over.

Instructions:

*Please note that the "how to page" displays the wrong controls. Please follow the below instructions for the game controls

  1. After clicking play, make sure to click on "Enter"  twice to  confirm
  2. Use the WASD keys to move the player
  3. Use I key to order an attack
  4. Use K key to order units to follow
  5. Use L key to order  gathering of resources
  6. Press Enter to confirm
  7. Press Escape to cancel
